document_data.mainbody: '''Atia Scorvo''' ({{Pronounce|AT|ee|ah|_|SCOR|vo|refs={{Cite adventurers league/Mayhem in the Earthspur Mines|36}}}}) was a [[medusa]] member of the [[Cult of the Black Earth]] in the [[Earthspur Mountains]] in [[1491 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Atia was a cruel and vain individual. She believed that all must admit that Atia was the most beautiful being. Those who eloquently praised her could sometimes delay their doom, but never for long. Atia also liked to play with her victims, offering an alliance but then quickly rejecting them and destroying anyone who believed her.
